Text.Page:
The sikandaris, for reasons we might never understand, accepted Killian's help to awaken Sikander from his long slumber.

Good intentions or not, we can't let Killian's vicious machinations shape Sikander's rebirth. Get in there and kill the sikandari lifebringers and their minions as they prepare for the final rituals.

No matter what Killian promised them, Sikander's return was never his goal. We've served the sikandaris' purpose better than they have.

Perhaps, in time, they'll come to realize that.
